
- Graphql Application was there and the API was also there
```
http://192.168.203.170:8433/api
```

- This query can extract all possible fields from the API

```
query={__schema{types{name,fields{name,args{name,description,type{name,kind,ofType{name, kind}}}}}}}
```
[Cyber chef output](https://gchq.github.io/CyberChef/#recipe=JSON_Beautify('%20%20%20%20',false,true)&)

- then Picked list users

```
{listUsers}
```

- Then got the OTP
```
{getOTP(user: "peter")}
```

- Used it on the app and got an email with the password
- Found the app in /opt/depreciated
- Created a file in /home/peter/code.txt with content admin:skt63dGG07PQeVCd
- From the App CLI attached this file which overwrited the file content of previous file.
- Used admin to log into the app and voila root password
